details.spack_dependencies: ^openblas@0.3.17/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' openblas@0.3.17 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ~ilp64 threads=none) ^intel-mpi@2019.10.317/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' intel-mpi@2019.10.317 % ${SPACK_COMPILER}) ^cmake@3.21.4/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' cmake@3.21.4 % ${SPACK_COMPILER})
